EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Area (44.0, -92.0)

- Wooden chest at (45.5, -92.5)

### Iron Plate Production at (-18.0, -53.0)

- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)

### Copper Ore Storage at (-20.5, -71.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at (-20.5, -71.5) containing 2 copper ore

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-14.5, 15.5) facing UP
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) containing 200 units of water at 15°
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components:
  - Empty pipe group at (-14.5, 12.5)
  - Water-filled pipe group at (-16.5, 19.5)
  - Empty pipe group at (-9.5, 20.5)
  - Empty pipe group at (5.5, 25.5)
- Electric pole network connecting broader system
System status: Not operational (boiler unfueled)

### Research Facility
- Lab containing 15 automation science packs
- Currently researching logistics technology
- No power due to steam engine issues

ERROR TIPS

### Coal Harvesting Issues
- Direct coal harvesting attempts are not adding coal to inventory despite successful harvest messages
- Multiple harvest attempts at different positions around coal patches are not yielding inventory results
- Coal cannot be crafted as it has no recipe

### Entity Placement and Cleanup Issues
- When placing entities, ensure the target position is clear of other entities
- Check for entity collisions before placement attempts
- Clean up existing entities before placing new ones in the same location
- Verify space availability for entity drop positions

### Resource Extraction Issues
- Cannot extract resources from entities without proper setup
- Verify entity state and contents before attempting extraction
- Ensure proper positioning relative to resource patches

### Fuel Management Issues
- Cannot insert fuel into entities without having fuel in inventory
- Verify fuel availability before attempting to insert
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure proper positioning next to entity when inserting fuel

### Entity State Verification Issues
- Check entity existence before attempting operations
- Verify entity state and warnings before operations
- Handle cases where entities may have been removed
- Monitor entity status changes after operations

### Power System Issues
- Steam engine not receiving electricity due to no fuel in boiler
- Monitor fluid connections between power system components
- Address "no input liquid" warnings in steam engine
- Ensure proper fluid flow through pipe networks

### Structure Alignment Issues
- Ensure proper alignment between connected entities (e.g., drill output to furnace input)
- Verify drop positions align with target entity inputs
- Check entity orientations match intended flow direction
- Consider space requirements for entity connections

### Inventory Management Issues
- Check inventory contents before attempting to place entities
- Verify required items are available for placement operations
- Monitor inventory changes after operations
